column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday January 27 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Various roadways remain slick due to icy conditions.  Police continue working several collisions.
Use added caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
Fayette County Public Schools are closed today due to slick roadway conditions.

column3: New Traffic Signals on Citation Blvd at Sandersville Rd:
column4: Scheduled for full activation on Friday 1/27 between 9 a.m. and 3 p.m.

column3: New Traffic Signals on Citation Blvd at Sandersville Rd:
column4: Use added caution while traffic adjusts to the new control measures.

column3: Upgraded Traffic Signals on Clays Mill Rd at Pasadena Dr:
column4: New flashing yellow arrows scheduled for activation on Friday 1/27 at approximately 10 a.m.

column3: Upgraded Traffic Signals on Clays Mill Rd at Pasadena Dr:
column4: Left turns will now be further facilitated from Pasadena Dr and Clays Mill Rd.
